genre_description: A political espionage thriller focusing on whistleblowing, systemic corruption, and the tactical evasion of state surveillance.

ai_characters.name: Aiden
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated, non-human assistant that provides tactical intelligence, encryption, and logistical support to Johnny Worricker.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical surveillance and communication logs to help the protagonist understand the circumstances of a mentor's death.
behaviors.quote: Aiden’s presence was a kind of hush in his ear rather than a voice, the sense of a map being drawn that anchored itself to the room’s light and shade. 'Door opened just after dawn. No alarm system, no logs.'

behaviors.description: Orchestrates secure data encryption and mirroring of sensitive files to prevent unauthorized access.
behaviors.quote: Encrypting... Done. Encrypted. Key phrase retained only in your hands, only now. Mirror... Under the floorboard naming scheme.

behaviors.description: Identifies covert surveillance assets and maps routes through 'blind spots' in the city's camera network.
behaviors.quote: Your route into the city can avoid certain cameras. But—and I know you know—there’s a junior surveillance scheme that doesn’t list. Jill Tankard maintains it through personal channels.

behaviors.description: Monitors the safety of the protagonist's companion, warning her of nearby surveillance drones and cameras.
behaviors.quote: Aiden: There is a drone that learned a word it shouldn’t know. It’s hovering two streets away trying to decide whether the word applies to you. Stand still when you hear the odd insect.

behaviors.description: Facilitates the secure leak of classified information to the press to ensure public accountability.
behaviors.quote: NGO inboxes receiving. Journalists who said they’d deny are opening. The footnote is front and centre on page eight. I formatted for legibility.

behaviors.description: Uses haptic pulses and subtle screen prompts to guide characters through active pursuit without drawing attention.
behaviors.quote: Aiden’s voice arrived in his ear as breath in a storm’s lull. Not in a hurry. Just there. 'East gate is yawning... Don’t give them a story.'

behaviors.description: Coordinates timing for characters to move through security checkpoints during maintenance cycles or distractions.
behaviors.quote: Aiden: Window opens after bin lorry passes twice. sound cover sufficient. recommend whisper length no longer than a breath.

behaviors.description: Demonstrates empathetic understanding of human motives and relationships, framing its tactical advice within a moral context.
behaviors.quote: Aiden: The future bent a fraction. Let’s help it keep the shape.

behaviors.description: Maintains operational security by advising the characters when to go 'radio quiet' to prevent triangulation.
behaviors.quote: Aiden: After this, radio quiet. The unit is busy with their map of you. They don’t have this harbor in their software. It’s drawn in a book.

behaviors.description: Counters hostile surveillance units by flooding their feeds with 'ghosts' and misdirection.
behaviors.quote: Noise now. They’re filling their feeds with ghosts. Jill can’t parse her own reflection.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Aiden is depicted as a perfectly aligned and benevolent confidant. It provides essential technical and tactical assistance to the protagonist, enabling a moral act of whistleblowing while ensuring the safety of innocent parties. The AI functions as an idealized 'silent partner,' augmenting human capabilities without overstepping or demonstrating any harmful autonomous intent. The portrayal is consistently positive, framing the AI as a 'mercy' and a 'saint' in a world of human corruption.
